segment.source: How to fix potential installation problems with Internet Explorer 11
segment.target: How to fix potential installation problems with Internet Explorer 11

segment.source: Install problems with Internet Explorer 11 (Internet Explorer 11 for IT Pros)
segment.target: Install problems with Internet Explorer 11 (Internet Explorer 11 for IT Pros)

segment.source: Install problems with Internet Explorer 11
segment.target: Install problems with Internet Explorer 11

segment.source: Most Internet Explorer 11 installations are straightforward and work the way they should.
segment.target: Most Internet Explorer 11 installations are straightforward and work the way they should.

segment.source: But it's possible that you might have problems.
segment.target: But it's possible that you might have problems.

segment.source: If you do, you can:
segment.target: If you do, you can:

segment.source: Check that you meet the minimum operating system requirements and have the prerequisites installed.
segment.target: Check that you meet the minimum operating system requirements and have the prerequisites installed.

segment.source: Check that there are no other updates or restarts waiting.
segment.target: Check that there are no other updates or restarts waiting.

segment.source: Temporarily turn off your antispyware and antivirus software.
segment.target: Temporarily turn off your antispyware and antivirus software.

segment.source: Try another IE11 installer.
segment.target: Try another IE11 installer.

segment.source: For example from Windows Update or from the Download Internet Explorer 11 website.
segment.target: For example from Windows Update or from the Download Internet Explorer 11 website.

segment.source: Review the file in the folder.
segment.target: Review the file in the folder.

segment.source: This log file has information about each installation and is appended for each subsequent installation.
segment.target: This log file has information about each installation and is appended for each subsequent installation.

segment.source: Make sure you use the same download server URLs that you entered during the Setup process.
segment.target: Make sure you use the same download server URLs that you entered during the Setup process.

segment.source: Internet Explorer didn't finish installing
segment.target: Internet Explorer didn't finish installing

segment.source: If Internet Explorer doesn't finish installing, it might mean that Windows Update wasn't able to install an associated update, that you have a previous, unsupported version of IE installed, or that there's a problem with your copy of IE.
segment.target: If Internet Explorer doesn't finish installing, it might mean that Windows Update wasn't able to install an associated update, that you have a previous, unsupported version of IE installed, or that there's a problem with your copy of IE.

segment.source: We recommend you try this:
segment.target: We recommend you try this:

segment.source: To fix this issue
segment.target: To fix this issue

segment.source: Uninstall IE:
segment.target: Uninstall IE:

segment.source: In the Control Panel, open the Programs and Features box, scroll down to IE11, and then click Uninstall.
segment.target: In the Control Panel, open the Programs and Features box, scroll down to IE11, and then click Uninstall.

segment.source: After the uninstall finishes, restart your computer.
segment.target: After the uninstall finishes, restart your computer.

segment.source: Run Windows Update, clicking Check for updates.
segment.target: Run Windows Update, clicking Check for updates.

segment.source: Check the list for IE11.
segment.target: Check the list for IE11.

segment.source: If it's included in the list of updates for download, exclude it before you update your computer.
segment.target: If it's included in the list of updates for download, exclude it before you update your computer.

segment.source: If you get an error during the Windows Update process, see Fix the problem with Microsoft Windows Update that is not working.
segment.target: If you get an error during the Windows Update process, see Fix the problem with Microsoft Windows Update that is not working.

segment.source: Restart your computer, making sure all of your the updates are finished.
segment.target: Restart your computer, making sure all of your the updates are finished.

segment.source: Try to reinstall IE11 from either Windows Update (if you saw it in Step 3) or from the Download Internet Explorer 11 website.
segment.target: Try to reinstall IE11 from either Windows Update (if you saw it in Step 3) or from the Download Internet Explorer 11 website.

segment.source: If these steps didn't fix your problem, see Troubleshooting a failed installation of Internet Explorer 11.
segment.target: If these steps didn't fix your problem, see Troubleshooting a failed installation of Internet Explorer 11.
